DOC.brief_title: Study 1st Line Therapy Study Durvalumab With Tremelimumab Versus SoC Non Small-Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) ( NEPTUNE ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize 1:1 receive treatment durvalumab + tremelimumab combination therapy SoC therapy . The primary objective study assess efficacy combination treatment compare SoC term Overall Survival ( OS ) patient .
